```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Create the data frame for the table
data <- data.frame(
  Category = c("Race", "", "Ever Taken DevEd Courses", "", "First Generation College", "", 
               "Academic Performance", "", "School", "", ""),
  Subgroup = c("Non-white", "White", "No", "Yes", "No", "Yes", 
               "Low Average GPA (<3.0)", "High Average GPA (>=3.0)", 
               "Augustine University (1)", "Julias University (2)", "University of Dream (3)"),
  All = c("38%", "29%", "33%", "33%", "33%", "33%", "17%", "44%", "50%", "14%", "50%"),
  Augustine_University = c("100%", "33%", "100%", "33%", "50%", "-", "0%", "67%", "", "", ""),
  Julias_University = c("25%", "0%", "0%", "25%", "17%", "0%", "25%", "0%", "", "", ""),
  University_of_Dream = c("33%", "100%", "50%", "50%", "50%", "50%", "0%", "67%", "", "", "")
)

# Add footnote for empty cells
footnote_text <- "- Empty cell due to insufficient data."

# Create the table
kable(data, format = "html", col.names = c("", "Subgroup", "All", 
                                           "Augustine University (1)", 
                                           "Julias University (2)", 
                                           "University of Dream (3)")) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%
  footnote(general = footnote_text)
```
